Text: Unless I missed something, It can't be unlocked. Any comments?

If Mapsource asks for Internet connection with Garmin servers, patch it.
Search TPB for "Mapsource v6.16.3 patched exe".
Or
Run Unlock mapset.exe in .gmap folder.

WindowsXP:
C:\Documents and Settings\username\Application Data\GARMIN\Maps

Vista/Seven:
C:\ProgramData\GARMIN\Maps
